title: Verify progressive data loading for large dataset
preconditions: User is logged into the application and has access to the dataset page.
steps:
1. Navigate to the dataset page.
2. Scroll down to the bottom of the page.
3. Observe the loading behavior as more data is fetched.
expected: The application should load additional rows progressively without freezing or crashing, and the total number of rows displayed should exceed 1000.
